attributes.action: We The British People Don't Want Liz Truss As Prime Minister of Great Britain
attributes.additional_details:
I want to see a leader that's voted in BY THE PEOPLE. 
The General Public vote a party in based on the values and the person leading that part. Liz Truss is not a representation of the people.

I want to see her OUT and a public election where THE PEOPLE can decide who runs this country based on leader and parties policies especially in these difficult times with the energy crisis.
attributes.background: We don't want Liz Truss running as leader of the Conservatives and want her OUT as Prime Minster. She doesn't have the demeanour to be a leader, she already caused Russia to go on combat alert due to her comments on the Ukraine war, and outspoken attitude has upset the French President Macron.
